meanings.definition: The act of ordaining or appointing someone to a position or role.
meanings.sent1: The ordainment of the new priest brought joy to the community.
meanings.sent2: Her ordainment as the leader was celebrated with a grand ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The ordainment of the cat as the king of the house was met with purrs of approval.
meanings.sent4: The ordainment of the sun as the ruler of the sky painted the world in golden hues.
meanings.sent5: The ordainment of the tree as the guardian of the forest was marked by the rustling of leaves.
